column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " If my uncle came up with a plan to abduct me when I was a kid , why was n't he caught ? "
#Text=Zaheer says : " He was n't with us that night , and he covered up his involvement afterwards . "
#Text=Korra says : " So he betrayed you , just like he betrayed me . "
#Text=Zaheer says : " Yes .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I want what you want : to restore balance to this world .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't think our ideas of balance are the same .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Are you sure about that ?
#Text=You kept the spirit portals open .
#Text=But why stop there ?
#Text=Bringing the spirits back should only be the beginning .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " The idea of having nations and governments is as foolish as keeping the human and spirit realms separate .
#Text=You 've had to deal with a moronic president and a tyrannical queen .
#Text=Do n't you think the world would be better off if leaders like them were eliminated ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=I mean , I do n't really agree with what they 've done , but taking out world leaders is n't the answer .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " It was n't too long ago that the airbenders were nearly all wiped out , thanks to the Fire Lord 's desire for world dominance .
#Text=True freedom can only be achieved when oppressive governments are torn down .
#Text=" Korra says : " But that wo n't bring balance .
#Text=It will throw the world into chaos .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Exactly .
#Text=The natural order is disorder .
#Text=Do you know who once said , " New growth can not exist without first the destruction of the old " ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " The wise Guru Laghima .
#Text=An airbender .
#Text="
